original_text: For the eyes of the Lord run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to give strong support to those whose heart is blameless toward him. You have done foolishly in this, for from now on you will have wars.”
korean_text: 여호와의 눈은 온 땅을 두루 감찰하사 전심으로 자기에게 향하는 자들을 위하여 능력을 베푸시나니 이 일은 왕이 망령되이 행하였은즉 이 후부터는 왕에게 전쟁이 있으리이다 하매

sentences.original_text: For the eyes of the Lord
run to and fro throughout the whole earth
to give strong support to those
whose heart is blameless toward him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 향한 마음이 흠이 없는 자들의

sentences.original_text: You have done foolishly in this
